item.title: Package Managers #lca2017
Hiding in the Shadow of Neptune
item.description: .embed-container { position: relative; padding-bottom: 56.25%; height: 0; overflow: hidden; max-width: 100%; } .embed-container iframe, .embed-container object, .embed-container embed { position: absolute; top: 0; left: 0; width: 100%; height: 100%; }

item.title: About
item.description: This is the personal website of Kristoffer Grönlund. Unless you already know who that is, nothing on this page is likely to interest you. If, after all, you do know me, it may be from such features as Kodsnack - A coding podcast in swedish crmsh - A cluster command line shell Hawk - A cluster web interface World in Conflict - A real-time strategy game github.com/krig - Other random source code I’ve put on Github This site is not a regular blog.
